english: Let's part ways, we'll meet in Aleppo.

text: Küçük şehzadeyi yakalayalım da Üstad'ı memnun edelim.
english: Let's capture the young prince and please the Master.

text: (Ertuğrul) Siz devam edin şehzadem, ben yetişirim.
english: (Ertuğrul) You continue, my prince, I'll catch up.

text: (Adam) Beyim sen yetiş, biz arkanı kollarız.
english: (Man) Sir, you come quickly, we'll cover your back.

text: (Kurdoğlu) Selcan denen o kancığı doğduğuna pişman edeceğim Yıva.
english: (Kurdoğlu) I'll make that bitch Selcan regret being born, Yıva. You'll take the life of

text: O iki canlı kancığın, bir canını alacaksın Yıva.
english: one of those two vicious bitches, Yiva.
Your father's killer is Suleyman Shah.

text: (Kurdoğlu) İnşallah kan kardeşimin sıhhate kavuştuğunu duymak nasip olur.
english: (Kurdoğlu) God willing, I will have the opportunity to hear that my blood brother has recovered.
...or I'll feed your carcass to the dogs.
...and returned with only two Turkmens, dear Titus.

text: Bu çocuk sıradan bir Türkmen değil, Sayın Kardinal.
english: This child is no ordinary Turkmen , Your Honor.

text: (Bamsı) Merak ettik, siz gelmeyince aklıma türlü türlü fena işler geldiydi.
english: (Bamsi) We were worried; when you didn't come, all sorts of nasty things came to my mind.
(Woman) Don't touch! Don't touch it, stay away.
Birds fly with their own kind.
Eagles with eagles, crows with crows .

text: Bize düşen, kartalları bir araya getirmekti.
english: Our task was to bring the eagles together.

text: Turgut Alp'le Yiğit hakikaten sabah burada olurlar mı?
english: Turgut Alp and Yiğit really be here in the morning?
We've overcome so many troubles together.
(Music - Emotional) I was just about to catch

text: Beni öldürmeye çalışan o adamı tam yakalamak üzereydim ki...
english: the man who was trying to kill me when...
(Ertuğrul) Nasır had stabbed him for no reason.
I questioned him after he recovered.

text: Ama dün gözümün önünde kendini öldürdü.
english: But yesterday, right in front of my eyes, he killed himself.

text: ...benim kendi ellerimle götürdüğüm yemekle o adamı zehirlediyse?
english: ... poisoned that man with the food I brought with my own hands?
What if I, with my own hands...

text: (Esma) Ya ben günaha girip can aldıysam Sultanım?
english: (Esma) What if I have sinned and taken a life, my Sultan?

text: Bizimle birlikte sen de perişan oldun.

text: Olur mu hiç öyle şey Hayme Ana?

text: Süleyman Şah Beyimiz benim de babam sayılır.

My sister and I have a lot of rights over us.
And I'll be her bride soon.

(Turgut Alp) I have only one life.
That too is a gift from God.
How can you possibly scare me?
Sometimes people are even afraid of themselves.
If they are not afraid for themselves...
...they will be afraid for the lives of their loved ones. Isn't that right,

text: İbnül Arabi'nin sandığı ve içindeki emanetlerimizi...
english: Ibn al-Arabi's chest and the treasures within it...
...I will surely get my hands on them one day.

don't know where he is, sir.

won't regret it if you check it out.

all night. I caused you trouble with

I served our Atabey for many years.

english: ...the important thing is not just being on the right path, but never deviating from the right path, not even for a moment.

Because of what I've told you...
...I hold myself responsible for your uncle's fate, sir.

text: Şahabettin Tuğrul her ne hak ettiyse, akıbeti o olacak.

thinks I'm the one who killed his father.

you, your husband, but most importantly...

english: The scales of justice in the Islamic world have not yet been so unbalanced. One

text: Allah’tan ümit kesilmez. Hele bir neticeyi bekleyelim.
english: should never lose hope in God. Let's wait for the result. What if
what should be done then? If

text: …eğri kılıçlarımız yoldan çıkanları doğru yola getirecektir.
english: …our crooked swords will bring those who have strayed back to the right path.
But Nasser, this is a dangerous job. As

text: Kadı Efendi, altın dolu keseleri kuşağına doldururken…
english: the judge stuffed the bags full of gold into his belt…
…he wasn’t thinking about the danger at all.
You said that Atabey's matter was settled.
Why are you trembling like a leaf now?
Once the matter concerning the Atabey is settled…

text: …melik hazretlerinin yanında senin gibi danışmanlara ihtiyacı olacak.
english: …His Majesty the King will need advisors like you.
Can you really do this, Nasser? Certainly

text: Elbette. Siz benim için mühimsiniz Kadı Hazretleri.
english: . You are important to me, Your Excellency.

text: Halep’te sizin kadar kolay satın alınan adam…
english: In Aleppo, it's not every day you find a man as easily bought as you are...

text: Halep Emirliği adına Melik El Aziz.
english: King Al-Aziz, on behalf of the Emirate of Aleppo. In the name of Allah, the

text: El adil olan, El Müntekim olan…
…El Kahhar olan, El Rahman olan Allah’ın adıyla.
Bugün burada Halep Emirliği Atabeyi Şahabettin Tuğrul’un…

english: we begin the trial of Shahabuddin Tugrul, the Atabeg of the Emirate of Aleppo.
The allegations... Murder, disobedience to authority...
betrayal of the city of Aleppo and the Ummah of Muhammad.
I am one of Şahabettin Tuğrul's personal guards.

text: Bana derecesi yüksek etkili bir zehir temin etmemi emretti.
english: He ordered me to obtain a highly potent poison.
I accepted as per the order. I saw those who tried to kill
the envoy from the Kayı tribe ...
... in the market with the Atabey.

text: Atabey onlara kese içinde bir şeyler veriyordu.
english: Atabey was giving them things in bags.
God only knows what he gave; it was gold.
I am a merchant; the Atabey forced me…

text: …Antakya Haçlı Kontluğundaki ticari işlerinde perde olarak beni kullandı.
english: …He used me as a front in his commercial dealings in the County of Antioch.
Şahabettin Tuğrul, you heard what was said.
What do you have to say?
I reject everything that has been said.
This is the court of justice and truth.

text: …siyahla beyaz gibi ayırır Allah’ın izniyle. Merak buyurma.
english: with God's permission, can distinguish between truth and falsehood, like black and white. Don't worry.

text: Seni Allah gönderdi Ümmül Hayr abla. Biz de sana haber gönderecektik.
english: God sent you, Sister Ummul Hayr. We were going to send you a message too. We
Peace be upon you. Wa alaikum assalam

text: Hayırdır inşallah, mühim bir hadise var demişsin.
english: Hopefully everything is alright, you said there's an important event. I don't know if you've heard what happened to

text: Atabeyimizin başına gelenleri işittiniz mi bilmem.
Şahabettin Tuğrul, özü sözü doğru bir insan.
english: Şahabettin Tuğrul is a man of his word. A valuable statesman whom

text: Cenabı Allah’ın bu devlete nasip ettiği değerli bir devlet adamı.
english: God Almighty has bestowed upon this nation . Everyone knows that he fulfilled

text: Atabeylik görevini layıkıyla yerine getirdiğini de herkes bilir.
english: his duties as Atabey (regent) with distinction .

text: Zor bir sınavdan geçiyor, Cenabı Allah yardımcısı olur.
english: He is going through a difficult test; may God help him.
Leyla learned about her uncle's condition.
Moreover, he has been in a terrible state ever since he learned that it was his older brother who had our Atabey imprisoned

text: ...abisi olduğunu öğrendiğinden bu yana hâli perişan.

english: he will get sick again... that he

text: Zavallı kız, halbuki son zamanlarda durumu iyiye gidiyordu, değil mi abla?
english: Poor girl, she was getting better lately, wasn't she, sister?
He had recovered with the support of our Atabey. But… can

text: Bizim bir faydamız dokunur mu abla?
english: we be of any help, sister? I say,
be comforted by the love of our sheikh. Before
the girl turned her face to the darkness ... I thought she should find

text: Mevzuyu şeyhimize açayım, sizi haberdar ederim.
english: I'll discuss the matter with our sheikh and keep you informed. May
God be pleased with you. So
you have a problem too? We

text: Dergâhta misafirlerimiz var. Onlar da zor imtihanlardan geçiyorlar.
english: have guests at the dervish lodge. They are also going through difficult trials.

text: Leyla gibi genç bir kızımız yaralı.
english: A young girl like Leyla is wounded.

text: Hafsa elinden geleni yaptı ama yaranın durumu kötüye gidiyor.
english: Hafsa did everything she could, but the wound is getting worse.

text: Şifa Allah’tan… Sarayın hekimi bir baksa belki faydası dokunur.
english: Healing comes from God… Perhaps the palace physician could take a look; it might help. Certainly
The girl's condition is critical, sister.
Will you swear on the Holy Quran that there will be no lies or falsehoods in what you say?

text: Bana evvel anlattığın gibi anlat kızım. Hiç kimseden de korkma.
english: Tell me about it the way you told me before, my daughter. Don't be afraid of anyone.

text: (Kadı) O gün neler oldu o odada?
english: (Judge) What happened in that room that day? My

text: Atabeyimle ben katilin olduğu odaya girdik efendim.
english: brother and I entered the room where the murderer was, sir. Did anyone

text: Sizden başka bilen var mıydı odayı?

english: What did you see when you entered (the judge)?
...was lying on the ground, and suddenly he began to tremble.
(Esma) Foam came out of her mouth. He had been poisoned. She died
(Judge) You may leave, my daughter. We
heard what we needed to hear.
You did well to let us know.

text: Yara iltihaplanmış, durumu çok iyi değil.
english: The wound is infected, and the situation is not good.
I made a small intervention. May

text: Ancak burada yapılabilecek fazla bir şey yok.
english: But there's not much that can be done here . He needs to be
carefully looked after at the palace and treated with

text: Elbette. Götürelim saraya. Madem durum bunu gerektirir.
english: . Let's take him to the palace. Since the situation demands it.

text: Hekim Efendi, siz yapılması gerekenleri bize söyleseniz…
english: Doctor, could you tell us what needs to be done... so
we can examine our patient here? I can't bear to let him leave my sight

text: Gözümün önünden ayrılmasına gönlüm razı gelmez.

english: His condition is critical. His life is in danger.

text: (Hekim) Biz burada yapılacak her şeyi yaptık.
english: (Doctor) We've done everything that can be done here.

text: (Hekim) Sarayda da elimizden gelen her şeyi yapacağız.
english: (Doctor) We will do everything we can in the palace as well.

text: Ancak neticenin ne olacağını Allah bilir.
english: But only God knows what the outcome will be. Do

text: Aklınız kalmasın efendi. Kızınızın canı bana emanet.
english: n't worry, sir. Your daughter's life is in my hands.
I will personally handle his case.

text: Ümmül Hayr Hanım, benim ablamdır. Sarayda kızımızı rahat ettirir.
english: Ummul Hayr is my older sister. He will make our daughter comfortable in the palace. She was the wet nurse of both

text: Kendisi Sultan El Aziz’in de kız kardeşinin de dadısıdır.
english: Sultan El Aziz and his sister.
Sultan Aziz is like his son.

text: İnşallah bir sıkıntı hasıl olmaz, içiniz rahat olsun.
english: Hopefully there won't be any problems, rest assured.

text: Şükürler olsun daha iyisin, değil mi?
english: Thank goodness you're feeling better, aren't you?
still have a day to see... ...and a bite to eat

text: İnşallah yakında kısmetse torunumuzu da kucağımıza alacağız.
english: God willing, we will soon be holding our grandchild in our arms.
Well, the time has come and gone.

text: Uyandığımdan bu yana duyduğum en muştulu haber bu.
english: This is the best news I've heard since I woke up.
For years we have longed for our grandchildren.

text: Gündoğdu ve Selcan bize bu mutluluğu yaşatacaklar.
english: Gündoğdu and Selcan will bring us this happiness. May

text: Allah onlara da kendi torunlarını görmeyi nasip etsin.
english: God grant them the blessing of seeing their own grandchildren.
Emirate of Aleppo lies ahead. Take down the flag
Rahman, bring me my horse. We

text: Yeni yurdumuza at üstünde girmek gerek.
english: must enter our new homeland on horseback. Here
you did not leave us without a leader.

text: Vallahi beyim, sarayın ön kapısında muhafızlar çok kalabalık.

might be able to get in from there, but...
...whether we can get out is uncertain. My lord, the

text: Atabeyin yargılandığını duyan halk, sarayın önüne doluşmuş beyim.
english: people gathered in front of the palace when they heard that Atabey was being tried. They're like

text: Barut gibiler. Muhafızlar zor zapt ediyor.

text: Şahabettin Tuğrul'un haksız yere suçlandığına kesinkes inanmışlar.

somehow get the Atabey out of there...

text: ...o kargaşa da kaçabiliriz, benden söylemesi beyim.
english: ...we can escape that chaos, take my word for it, sir. Don't worry about

text: Sen buna bakma beyim, daha zindanın yerini bilmiyoruz.
english: that, sir, we don't even know where the dungeon is yet.
It's difficult without inside help. In

text: Bana kalırsa, Şahabettin'e varmadan yakalanmış oluruz.
english: my opinion, we'll be caught before we even get to Şahabettin.
What news do you have, sir?

text: Anlatırım, önce dergâha gidip Halime'nin durumuna bir bakalım hele.
english: I'll explain, but first let's go to the dervish lodge and check on Halime's condition.

text: Hele bir saraya varalım, Halime kızımız çok daha iyi olacak.
english: Once we get to the palace, our daughter Halime will be much better.
(Herald) Hear ye, hear ye! Don't say you did
n't hear it! It was decided that

text: Emir Hazretleri Gıyaseddin El Aziz'in Atabeyi Şahabettin Tuğrul'un...
english: Emir Ghiyaseddin El Aziz's Atabey, Shahabuddin Tugrul, was

text: ...kafirlerle iş birliği içinde olan bir hain olduğuna...
english: a traitor who collaborated with the infidels,
and that he should be executed.

text: Beyim müsaade et tepeleyeyim şunları, ibreti alem olsun diye.
english: crush them, as a lesson to the world . The

text: Atabey Şahabettin Tuğrul'un infazı bugün ikindi vakti yapılacaktır.
english: execution of Atabey Şahabettin Tuğrul will take place this afternoon.

text: (Adam 2) Şahabettin bizim babamızdır. Esas hain sizsiniz!
english: (Man 2) Şahabettin is our father. You are the real traitors! Our

text: Pirim, ihvan kardeşimiz, refikimiz Şahabettin Tuğrul bugün...
english: leader, our brother and comrade Şahabettin Tuğrul is today...
...being subjected to various slanders and brought before the courts.

text: Biz onun bu hâlinden dolayı acı çekiyoruz.
english: We are suffering because of his condition .
What do you say about this matter? My Lord, who rescued
Jonah from the belly of the fish,
Job from the worm gnawing at his wound,
Moses from the Nile, and the
will also rescue our brother if He so wills.
We will seek refuge in Him too. The God who transformed

text: İbrahim'in düştüğü ateşi, bir gül bahçesine çeviren Allah...
english: the fire into which Abraham fell into a rose garden...
...will also transform the prison into which Şahabettin Tuğrul fell...
...into a mother's womb. Those who expected

text: Oradan zulüm, cinayet, ihanet çıkmasını bekleyenler...

text: ...oradan yepyeni bir diriliş çıktığını görüp şaşakalırlar.

(Sounds of the door being forced open)
(Sound of knocking on the door) Do

you won't remember any of the pain you've endured.

What are you doing here, Yiğit?
I wasn't doing anything wrong. Are you
you want me to help you?
me, who are you looking for?

text: O çok... çok güçlü bir savaşçı!
english: He's a very... very powerful warrior! He's

Hmm, so it's very powerful? Do
you love your older brother Turgut very much?
Yes, I love it very much.

text: Bir bey gibi en doğru kararı verdin.
english: You made the right decision, like a true gentleman. May
In the name of Allah. May
You too. Have a safe journey.

text: Ben Oğuzların Bozok kolundan, Kayı Boyunun Bey'i Süleyman Şah.
english: I am Suleyman Shah, the Bey of the Kayı tribe, from the Bozok branch of the Oghuz Turks. We go to the homeland that

text: Halep Emiri Gıyasettin El Aziz'in boyuma verdiği yurda gideriz.
english: the Emir of Aleppo, Ghiyath al-Din al-Aziz, gave to me.
We are here on the orders of Al-Aziz. We were instructed not
to let you into the city and to escort you

text: ...Halep topraklarından çıkana kadar refakat etmemiz talimatı verildi.

english: n't leave us, Father Şahabettin! The

text: Atabeyim, son bir diyeceğin var mı?
english: Father, do you have one last thing to say? Don't

text: Her ne yaptıysam ümmetin selameti için yaptım.
english: Everything I did, I did for the well-being of the Muslim community.
The Quran is my guide, and God is my witness. I hold
my head high! My case is just!
